name: Shanks
text: Once Per Turn: You may activate this effect when your opponent attacks. Give up to 1 of your opponent's leader or characters Power -1000 for the turn.

effect.text: You may activate this effect when your opponent attacks. Give up to 1 of your opponent's leader or characters -1000 power for the turn.

meta.notes: Leader ability. Activates during opponent's Attack Step (rule 7-1-1-3 [On Your Opponent's Attack]). Once per turn restriction applies per rule 8-3-2. Power modification lasts until end of turn.
